binksModal.title: Tutorial
binksModal.greetingsText: no character NFTs were found on your wallet, perhaps you are a new recruit, so Bings will provide training for you. Turn on the sound and listen carefully
binksModal.doneText: You're done with tutorial. Want to repeat it once again?

rulesModal.title: Правила
rulesModal.p1: an armed duel regulated by written rules or customs, the purpose of which is to satisfy the desire of one of the duelists
rulesModal.p2: (challenging a duel) to respond to the insult inflicted on his honor in compliance with pre-agreed and equal conditions of the battle. As a rule, duels occur only within certain social strata and are often associated with the aristocracy, although in fact they are not tied to any of them.
rulesModal.p3: Currently prohibited by the legislation of the vast majority of countries in the world. The exception is Paraguay.
